title: Sovereign - From Personal Power to Systemic Change
subtitle: You've mastered personal sovereignty. Ready to build sovereign systems?

hero.title: From Personal to Planetary Sovereignty
hero.subtitle: You've mastered personal sovereignty. Ready to build sovereign systems?
hero.tagline: The protocols and networks for Red operators who are ready to architect reality, not just operate within it.

protocols.title: Sovereignty Protocols Library
protocols.description: Field-tested templates from the Sovereign book, refined by practitioners like you. Download, implement, and share what works.
protocols.feature1: Protocol templates for each chapter's field tests

systemic.title: From Personal to Systemic
systemic.description: Discover how your sovereignty practices connect to larger governance frameworks. Learn how your crew becomes a governance structure.
systemic.feature2: Your Platform Economics → Hearts & Leaves Systems (Ch 10)

network.title: The Architect's Network
network.description: Join other sovereign operators building kingdoms. Share protocols, solve problems together, and multiply force through alliance.

journey.title: The Sovereignty Path
journey.intro: From reactive operator to conscious architect. Here's how the journey typically unfolds.

stage1.title: Personal Mastery
stage1.description: You complete the Sovereign field tests. You build your cognitive sovereignty, establish your core crew, and design your first protocols.

stage2.title: Recognition of Patterns
stage2.description: You notice your personal protocols mirror larger governance frameworks. What you designed for your crew could work at scale.

stage3.title: Systemic Integration
stage3.description: You discover how your economics implement Hearts/Leaves systems. How your crew structure aligns with Meta-Governance principles. How your protocols feed into global frameworks.

stage4.title: Architect of Reality
stage4.description: You're no longer just practicing sovereignty. You're building systems that others adopt. You're playing the meta-game, designing the rules others follow.

cta.title: Ready to Build Systems, Not Just Operate Within Them?
cta.description: Start with the protocols library. Move into systemic integration when you're ready. Join the network to multiply your force through alliance.

protocols.title: Sovereignty Protocols Library
protocols.subtitle: Field-tested protocols from Sovereign practitioners. Download, implement, refine, and share what works.
protocols.noProtocolsFound: No protocols found for this chapter yet. Be the first to submit one!

submitForm.title: Submit Your Protocol
submitForm.name: Name
submitForm.chapter: Which chapter is this protocol for?
submitForm.whatDidnt: What didn't work? What would you change?
submitForm.willingToShare: I'm willing to have this protocol shared publicly (anonymously unless I specify otherwise)
submitForm.successMessage: Protocol submitted successfully! We'll review it and add it to the library soon.

integration.title: From Personal to Systemic
integration.subtitle: Discover how your sovereignty practices connect to planetary governance frameworks

insight.title: The Recognition
insight.text: What you built for your crew isn't just good leadership. It's a working prototype of governance systems that can coordinate at any scale. You've been piloting the future without knowing it.

bridge.title: The Same Architecture at Different Scales
bridge.intro: The principles that work for 5 people work for 5,000. The protocols that coordinate your crew can coordinate organizations, networks, or entire regions. You're not learning new concepts—you're recognizing what you already built.
bridge.personalDesc: Crew protocols, economic models, alliance networks, legacy systems
bridge.systemicDesc: Coordination councils, regenerative currencies, nested sovereignty, intergenerational wisdom

implementation.title: Your Implementation Path
implementation.intro: Ready to scale your sovereignty? Here's how to move from personal practice to systemic architecture.

step1.title: Document Your Protocols
step1.description: Take what's working in your organization and formalize it. Make it replicable, teachable, transferable.

step2.title: Study the Frameworks
step2.description: Understand the larger systems your protocols connect to. See how your local solutions map to global coordination.

step3.title: Join the Network
step3.description: Connect with other sovereign operators who are building similar systems. Share learning, multiply force.

step4.title: Build at Scale
step4.description: Design systems for organizations, regions, or movements. Become an architect of reality, not just an operator within it.

network.title: The Architect's Network
network.subtitle: Connect with other sovereign operators building kingdoms. Share protocols, solve problems together, and multiply force through alliance.

discord.title: Join the Sovereign Discord
discord.description: This is where sovereign operators coordinate. Share what's working, get feedback on challenges, find allies, and connect with the broader Global Governance Frameworks community.
discord.note: Free to join. Active moderation. Respect required.

introductions.title: #introductions
introductions.description: Who you are, what you're building, which chapter you're implementing

protocols.title: #protocol-lab
protocols.description: Share what's working. Get feedback. Refine and iterate together.

problems.title: #challenges
problems.description: Stuck on something? Post it. Someone's already solved it.

wins.title: #wins
wins.description: Celebrate progress. Your wins inspire others. Track momentum.

questions.title: #ask-anything
questions.description: No stupid questions. Operators helping operators.

gff.title: #ggf-connection
gff.description: Bridge to the larger governance frameworks. Systemic integration.

showcase.title: Kingdoms Being Built
showcase.intro: Real implementations from Sovereign practitioners. These aren't case studies—they're operators in the field.

empty.title: First Builds Coming Soon
empty.description: Be among the first to showcase your implementation. Join Discord, build something using Sovereign principles, and share your results.

yourTurn.title: Building Something?
yourTurn.description: Share your implementation in Discord. Successful builds get featured here. Help others learn from what you're doing.

operators.title: Operators Only
operators.description: This is for people building things, not theorizing. Show your work or you won't last.

mutual.title: Mutual Elevation
mutual.description: We're here to make each other more capable. Competition is external, not internal.

results.title: Results Matter
results.description: Share what actually worked. Theory without implementation isn't useful.

bridge.title: Bridge to Systems
bridge.description: Your sovereignty practice connects to planetary governance. We help you see how.
